mapper.select: select user.username,user.avatar_url,user.created_at,user.updated_at,user.deleted_at from user where id=#{id} and deleted_at IS NULL
select user.username,user.avatar_url,user.created_at,user.updated_at,user.deleted_at from user where username=#{username} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, username, password, avatar_url, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at) values (#{id},#{username},#{password},#{avatarUrl},#{createdAt},#{updatedAt},#{deletedAt})
